data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Khatlon, Tajikistan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khatlon, Tajikistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Khatlon.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: the state of Khatlon has (about) 1,614 people who know Jesus, 8,227 people who know about him culturally, and 2,327,859 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help every believer in Khatlon, Tajikistan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Persian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, help your children in Khatlon, Tajikistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help 467 new simple churches start among the 2,337,700 people in the state of Khatlon, Tajikistan. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khatlon, Tajikistan has a population of 2,337,700.

We estimate Khatlon has 1,614 people who might know Jesus, 8,227 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,327,859 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,448 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 1,614 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
